name: Zombie Cubes (itch)
description:
The Game is made in the Blender Game Engine and is a small Prototype  of creating an  AI System.

You play an little Cube Dude that is trying to survive attacks from Zombies. You kill the Zombies with a Spacegun. You need 3 Shots for every Zombie. If you killed 10 Zombies you are won this game. 

 The Game Languages mixed with German and English. Sorry for that, I made the game in 5 hours  :s

Controls: 

  • F = Paused
  • Spacebar = Shoot
  • Up Arrow or W = Move Forward
  • Left/Right Arrow or A/D = Rotating
  • Down Arrow or S = Move Backwars

Have fun to play and good luck. ;)
